name: Santa's Industry - T7
description:
HO HO HO MERRY CHRISTMAS !

Ever wonder how Santa made all your christmas gifts ?

This game is the answer you've been looking for.

Play as Santa, looking over his elves in his workshop, but be careful, those little being are a little bit unopened. 

Shoot presents at your dancing elves with your tromblon to get them back down to work.

This game was made in 3 days by a team of 11 students.

Producing: Jean Dambrine

Game Design: Aymeric Mullot / Robin Le Guyader / Louis Fouéré / Pierre Mallet

Programming: Ulysse Raillon / Xavier Decourt / Corentin Lelong / Karim Al-Homsi

Art: Mallaurie Le Bihan / Elora Loigerot
